tool_description: Calculates population density metrics including persons per square mile, housing unit density, and comparative density rankings.

population_counts.description: Population counts for each geographic area

area_square_miles.description: Area in square miles for each geographic area

housing_units.description: Housing unit counts for housing density calculation

calculate_rankings.description: Calculate density rankings across all areas

density_categories.description: Classify areas into density categories (urban, suburban, rural)

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: population_counts and area_square_miles must have the same length
Invalid area values: All area values must be greater than zero
Invalid population values: All population counts must be non-negative integers
Housing units mismatch: housing_units array must match length of population_counts when provided
Zero area detected: Cannot calculate density for areas with zero square miles
usage: Provide population_counts and corresponding area_square_miles arrays. Optionally include housing_units for housing density calculations and enable rankings and categorization.

population_density.description: Population density per square mile for each area

housing_density.description: Housing units per square mile for each area

density_categories.description: Density category classification for each area

average_density.description: Average population density across all areas
